text:
Saturday Savings: Emma Robert's Topshop Satin Slip Is on Sale!



Finally, a style that’s both chic and comfortable.

Out and about on a sunny day, Emma Roberts pairs an off-white satin dress with brown flats, a gemstone necklace and crossbody bag…

Source: Saturday Savings: Emma Robert's Topshop Satin Slip Is on Sale!
